We stopped in for a quick bite en route to sightseeing and thought the crepes were delicious.  I had a tomato and spinach crepe - and was pleasantly surprised to taste really whole juicy tomato slices and a slightly crispy/chewy crepe which is exactly the way I like it.  My friend had a tomato and emmenthal crepe and also enjoyed hers.  It's a cute place too, and supposedly it's been around since 1999!  I'd come back again.
